name: Wynaut
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.

poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Wobbuffet from your hand onto Wynaut (this counts as evolving Wynaut) and remove all damage counters from Wynaut.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.effect: Choose 1 card from your opponent’s hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.
